actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow vendor refunds of Federal excise taxes on kerosene used in unvented heaters for home heating purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow, when certain conditions are met, vendor refunds of Federal excise taxes on kerosene used in unvented heaters for home heating purposes.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow vendor refunds of Federal excise taxes on kerosene used in unvented heaters for home heating purposes.
